title: Where can I learn the ServiceNow platform well? - Quora

response.answer_text: Developer Site (developer.servicenow.com) is the best place to get your basics. They let you get an Instance free of cost. You also have a course on Udemy for ServiceNow fundamentals. It's a great start & as always working on it counts. Go up to ServiceNow Community, it's a great place to share knowledge. There are tons of tutorials if you look up. It's a great skill to master ServiceNow as it has huge demand. Happy Learning!!! :)

Inside ServiceNow honestly. Not enough ebooks available. There are some YouTube tutorials available to give you a look into it. However there are coaching centres available to give you a fair understanding.
